api_list.name: list
api_list.description: Crypto coins pair list. You can use this in this API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-indicators1.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-indicators1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-indicators1.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-indicators1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
